name: Kitsu Refined
description: Adds several minor design changes and bugfixes to Kitsu.io
additional_info:
Changes:
  • Fixed Sticky side panels
  • Removed hover effect on nav bar
  • Added color to secondary nav bar, as well as a few other places
  • Overall site layout is a little wider
  • Art a little larger for the anime list
  • Removed some empty space above the list search bar
  • Advances search now fills the screen, with the filters all the way to the left, and more results are displayed in the remaining space
This is an ongoing project, I will be making continue to update this style with changes as I make them
